content.text: {"risk_score": 0.95, "summary": "High-risk transaction: $15,000 payment from elderly vulnerable customer with fraud history, representing 71% of annual income. Transaction has unknown location and missing device ID.", "chain_of_thought": "This transaction shows multiple severe risk factors: 1) Large amount ($15,000) represents 71% of customer's annual income ($21,000), 2) Customer profile indicates vulnerability (elderly, widowed, low digital literacy), 3) Customer has fraud flag and prior scam victimization, 4) Transaction has suspicious indicators (unknown location, missing device ID), 5) Customer has not completed scam education despite prior alerts."}
